solution_line_template: After the {people_leaving} people leave, there will be {initial_people}-{people_leaving} = <<{initial_people}-{people_leaving}={remaining_people}>>{remaining_people} people left.
The {remaining_people} people will eat {remaining_people}/{initial_people} = {people_fraction} as much food as the original group of people in the castle.
The {food_days_left} days' worth of food will last this smaller group for {food_days_left} days / ({people_fraction}) = <<{food_days_left}/({people_fraction})={more_days}>>{more_days} more days.
